Kyungpook National University: Kyungpook National University (경북대학교, abbreviated as KNU or Kyungdae, 경대) is one of ten Flagship Korean National Universities representing Gyeongbuk Province in South Korea.  It is located in the Daegu, which used to be the capital city of the Gyeongbuk Province, South Korea before allocating Government of Gyeongsangbuk-do to Andong. Recently KNU offers Philosophy, politics and economics programme.
